import React, {useState} from 'react' import {Fullscreen,Sidebar,Circle,Imaherr,Picker,Boardcont, Topbar, Circletop, Circle2, Imatop, Gomaa, Imagom, Sidebaar, Pinceld, Gomad} from './PizarronElements' import Pincel from '../Images/pincel.png' import logo from '../Images/EBlogo.png' import Goma from '../Images/goma.png' import Boardi from './Board' import Canvas from './Canvas' const BoardMain = () => { const[selectedColor, setSelectedColor] = useState("black"); return (
setSelectedColor(e.target.value)} />
setSelectedColor("white")} src={Goma}/>
) } export default BoardMain
